summary: Straight Old White Guys (SOWG) need to be quiet, listen and learn, not pontificate on how great they are because they stopped being backwards
title: Straight Old White Guy's Guide to Talking About Race, Abortion, Feminism and LGBT issues

summary:
A new paper, “Polynomial Time Cryptanalytic Extraction of Neural Network Models,” by Adi Shamir and others, uses ideas from differential cryptanalysis to extract the weights inside a neural network using specific queries and their results.  This is much more theoretical than practical, but it’s a really interesting result. 
Abstract:
Billions of dollars and countless GPU hours are currently spent on training Deep Neural Networks (DNNs) for a variety of tasks...
title: Model Extraction from Neural Networks
